means: 被抛弃的人，坐船遇难者，漂流者

sentence.Network_en: This old man was a castaway Englishman, Henry Atkins by name.

sentence.Network_en: It'll be to offer her a castaway.
sentence.Network_cn: 那等于是让她看一个丧魂落魄者.

entry.tran: 船沉后漂流至孤岛(或岸边)的人
entry.def: A castaway is a person who has managed to swim or float to a lonely island or shore after their boat has sunk.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who is rejected (from society or home)
